text: aur (yaad karo) jab hamane banee israeel se drdh vachan liya ki allaah ke siva kisee kee ibaadat (vandana) nahin karoge tatha maata-pita ke saath upakaar karoge aur sameepavartee sambandhiyon, anaathon, deen-dukhiyon ke saath aur logon se bhalee baat bologe tatha namaaz kee sthaapana karoge aur zakaat doge, phir tumamen se thode ke siva sabane munh pher liya aur tum (abhee bhee) munh phere hue ho
